member.name: T:Bob.Call
member.summary: A class to store all calls.

member.name: F:Bob.Call.method
member.summary: The method to which this call belongs.

member.name: F:Bob.Call.name
member.summary: The full name of this call, e.g. "Bob".

member.name: F:Bob.Call.notations
member.summary: A list of possible notations of this call. Sould be lower case or a symbol, as calling positions are uppercase.

member.name: F:Bob.Call.place_notations
member.summary: The place notations which make up the call.

member.name: F:Bob.Call.calling_positions
member.summary: A list of strings which contain the possible calling positions for the call, indexed from zero. Each string should be a list of the possible alternative calling positions, e.g. "IB" for In and Before.

member.name: F:Bob.Call.every
member.summary: Every how many changes the calling position can be called. Must be a factor of the lead length of the method. For lead end calls this is set automagically.

member.name: F:Bob.Call.from
member.summary: How many changes away from every `every` changes the call can be called. E.g. for Stedman this will be -3, and `every` will be 6. For lead-end calls this is set automagically.

member.name: F:Bob.Call.cover
member.summary: How many plain changes this call covers, because CCCBR now allow calls to extend the lead length of a method. For lead end calls this is set automagically.

member.name: P:Bob.Call.overall_transposition
member.summary: The overall transposition caused by the call (note this is not the lead end after the call).

member.name: P:Bob.Call.is_plain
member.summary: True if the call is a `plain` call, otherwise false. In BobC# these exist, so that call list touches (e.g. PPBPS) work properly.

member.name: P:Bob.Call.length
member.summary: The number of changes which the change covers.

member.name: P:Bob.Call.preferred_notation
member.summary: The preferred notation of the call (this is always the first value in the list of notations).

member.name: M:Bob.Call.GetCallingPositionIndex(System.Char)
member.summary: Gets the index (from 0) of the calling position denoted by `notation`.
member.param: The notation of the calling position who's index is wanted.
member.returns: The index of calling position denotated by `notation`.

member.name: M:Bob.Call.Init
member.summary: Initialises the call (right now it just calls an exception if `every` is not a factor of the method's lead length).

member.name: M:Bob.Call.#ctor(Bob.Method,System.String,System.Char[],Bob.PlaceNotation[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a call without calling positions.
member.param: The method to which this call belongs.
The full name of the call, e.g. "Bob".
A list of possible notations, e.g. ['-'. 'b']. Should be lower case.
A list of the place notations which make up the call.
Every how many changes the call can be called.
How many changes from the `every` changes the call can be called. E.g. for Stedman, this is -3 and `every` is 6.
How many plain course changes this change covers (CCCBR now allow calls which change the lead length of the method).

member.name: M:Bob.Call.#ctor(Bob.Method,System.String,System.Char[],Bob.PlaceNotation,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a single change call without calling positions.
member.param: The method to which this call belongs.
The full name of the call, e.g. "Bob".
A list of possible notations, e.g. ['-'. 'b']. Should be lower case.
The place notation of the call.
Every how many changes the call can be called.
How many changes from the `every` changes the call can be called. E.g. for Stedman, this is -3 and `every` is 6.
How many plain course changes this change covers (CCCBR now allow calls which change the lead length of the method).

member.name: M:Bob.Call.#ctor(Bob.Method,System.String,System.Char[],Bob.PlaceNotation[],System.String[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a call with calling positions.
member.param: The method to which this call belongs.
The full name of the call, e.g. "Bob".
A list of possible notations, e.g. ['-'. 'b']. Should be lower case.
A list of the place notations which make up the call.
A list of strings containing (per place) every possible notations (should be upper case).
Every how many changes the call can be called.
How many changes from the `every` changes the call can be called. E.g. for Stedman, this is -3 and `every` is 6.
How many plain course changes this change covers (CCCBR now allow calls which change the lead length of the method).

member.name: M:Bob.Call.#ctor(Bob.Method,System.String,System.Char[],Bob.PlaceNotation,System.String[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a single change call with calling positions.
member.param: The method to which this call belongs.
The full name of the call, e.g. "Bob".
A list of possible notations, e.g. ['-'. 'b']. Should be lower case or symbols.
The place notation of the call.
A list of strings containing (per place) every possible notations (should be upper case).
Every how many changes the call can be called.
How many changes from the `every` changes the call can be called. E.g. for Stedman, this is -3 and `every` is 6.
How many plain course changes this change covers (CCCBR now allow calls which change the lead length of the method).

member.name: M:Bob.Call.LeadEndCall(Bob.Method,System.String,System.Char[],Bob.PlaceNotation[])
member.summary: Creates a given call over the lead end of a given method (without calling positions).
member.param: The method to which this call belongs.
The full name of the call, e.g. "Bob".
A list of possible notations, e.g. ['-'. 'b']. Should be lower case or symbols.
A list of the place notations which make up the call.
member.returns: A call over the lead end of the given method.

member.name: M:Bob.Call.LeadEndCall(Bob.Method,System.String,System.Char[],Bob.PlaceNotation[],System.String[])
member.summary: Creates a given call over the lead end of a given method (with calling positions).
member.param: The method to which this call belongs.
The full name of the call, e.g. "Bob".
A list of possible notations, e.g. ['-'. 'b']. Should be lower case or symbols.
A list of the place notations which make up the call.
A list of strings containing (per place) every possible notations (should be upper case).
member.returns: A call over the lead end of the given method.

member.name: M:Bob.Call.LeadEndBob(Bob.Method,Bob.PlaceNotation[],System.String[])
member.summary: Creates a `bob` call over the lead end of a given method.
member.param: The method to which the call belongs.
A list of the place notations which make up the call.
A list of strings containing (per place) every possible notations (should be upper case). If null, standard calling positions will be generated.
member.returns: The `bob` call that was created.

member.name: M:Bob.Call.LeadEndBob(Bob.Method,Bob.PlaceNotation,System.String[])
member.summary: Creates a `bob` call over the lead end of a given method.
member.param: The method to which the call belongs.
The place notation of the call.
A list of strings containing (per place) every possible notations (should be upper case). If null, standard calling positions will be generated.
member.returns: The `bob` call that was created.

member.name: M:Bob.Call.LeadEndBob(Bob.Method,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Creates a `bob` call over the lead end of a given method.
member.param: The method to which the call belongs.
The full place notation of the call, e.g. "3.1" for Grandsire Bobs.
A list of strings containing (per place) every possible notations (should be upper case). If null, standard calling positions will be generated.
member.returns: The `bob` call that was created.

member.name: M:Bob.Call.LeadEndSingle(Bob.Method,Bob.PlaceNotation[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a `single` call over the lead end of a given method.
member.param: The method to which the call belongs.
A list of the place notations which make up the call.
A list of strings containing (per place) every possible notations (should be upper case). If null, standard calling positions will be generated.
member.returns: The `single` call that was created.

member.name: M:Bob.Call.LeadEndSingle(Bob.Method,Bob.PlaceNotation)
member.summary: Creates a `single` call over the lead end of a given method.
member.param: The method to which the call belongs.
The place notation of the call.
A list of strings containing (per place) every possible notations (should be upper case). If null, standard calling positions will be generated.
member.returns: The `single` call that was created.

member.name: M:Bob.Call.LeadEndSingle(Bob.Method,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a `single` call over the lead end of a given method.
member.param: The method to which the call belongs.
The full place notation of the call, e.g. "3.123" for Grandsire Singles.
A list of strings containing (per place) every possible notations (should be upper case). If null, standard calling positions will be generated.
member.returns: The `single` call that was created.

member.name: M:Bob.Call.LeadEndPlain(Bob.Method,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a `plain` call (a call which does nothing) over the lead end of a given method.
member.param: The method to which the call belongs.
How many changes the call covers.

member.name: F:Bob.Call.bob_name
member.summary: The standard full name for any `bob` calls.

member.name: F:Bob.Call.single_name
member.summary: The standard full name for any `single` calls.

member.name: F:Bob.Call.plain_name
member.summary: The standard full name for any `plain` calls.

member.name: P:Bob.Call.bob_notations
member.summary: List of standard notations for bobs. Defaults to ['-', 'b'].

member.name: P:Bob.Call.single_notations
member.summary: List of standard notations for singles. Defaults to ['s'].

member.name: P:Bob.Call.plain_notations
member.summary: List of standard notations for plain calls. Defaults to ['m', 'p'].

member.name: P:Bob.Call.standard_calling_positions_bob
member.summary: Gets the standard calling positions for lead-end bobs.

member.name: P:Bob.Call.standard_calling_positions_single
member.summary: Gets the standard calling positions for lead-end singles.

member.name: T:Bob.Change
member.summary: A class to store rows of ringing, as well as all transpositions (Change objects are read-only).

member.name: P:Bob.Change.array
member.summary: The array of integers (indexed from 0) which represent the change.

member.name: P:Bob.Change.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the bell at some index in the change.
member.param: The index of the bell (starting from 0).
member.returns: The index of the bell in that position (starting from 0).

member.name: P:Bob.Change.stage
member.summary: Gets the stage of this change.

member.name: P:Bob.Change.parity
member.summary: Gets the parity (oddness/evennes) of the change. This depends on how many called changes are required to get to this change.

member.name: P:Bob.Change.order
member.summary: Gets the number of times the change can be repeated before returning to rounds.

member.name: P:Bob.Change.clone
member.summary: Gets a cloned copy of the change.

member.name: P:Bob.Change.rotating_sets
member.summary: Returns a jagged 2D array of sets of bells which follow a common path when this change is repeated.
member.example: In the change "1245376", the 1 and 2 follow their own path; the 3, 4 and 5 rotate together, and the 6 and 7 repeatedly swap. Therefore the array (indexing from 0) would be [ [0], [1], [2, 3, 4], [6, 7] ].

member.name: P:Bob.Change.rotating_sets_as_string
member.summary: Gets the rotating sets of this change as a string, to prevent user conversions.

member.name: M:Bob.Change.Transpose(Bob.ITransposition)
member.summary: Transposes this change by another transposable object, e.g. place notations and other changes.
member.param: The transposable object by which this change will be transposed.
member.returns: The transposed change.

member.name: M:Bob.Change.IndexOf(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the index of a given bell (all indices from 0).
member.param: The bell you want to find the index of (indexing from 0).
member.returns: The index (from 0) of the bell. Returns -1 if the bell isn't in the change.

member.name: M:Bob.Change.GetArray
member.summary: Gets the array of the change. Satisfies the interface ITransposable.

member.name: M:Bob.Change.#ctor(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Creates a change with an integer array.
member.param: The array of bells (indexed from 0) in the change you want to create.

member.name: M:Bob.Change.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a change from the text (e.g. "13256478").
member.param: The text representing your change.

member.name: M:Bob.Change.op_Multiply(Bob.Change,Bob.ITransposition)
member.summary: Shorthand for transposing a changes by any transposable object.
member.param: The change which is being transposed.
The object which the change is being transposed by.
member.returns: The transposed change.

member.name: M:Bob.Change.op_Multiply(Bob.Change,Bob.PlaceNotation[])
member.summary: Shorthand for transposing a change by a list of place notations, e.g. a list of the place notations in a plain lead of a method.
member.param: The change which is being transposed.
The list of place notations over which the change will be transposed.
member.returns: The transposed change.

member.name: M:Bob.Change.op_Equality(Bob.Change,Bob.Change)
member.summary: Checks whether changes `a` and `b` are equal.
member.param: The left hand change.
The right hand change.
member.returns: True if the changes are equal, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Bob.Change.op_Inequality(Bob.Change,Bob.Change)
member.summary: Checks whether changes `a` and `b` are not equal.
member.param: The left hand change.
The right hand change.
member.returns: False if the changes are equal, otherwise true.

member.name: M:Bob.Change.Rounds(Bob.Stage)
member.summary: Gets a change representing rounds on a given stage.
member.param: The stage which you want rounds for.
member.returns: A change representing rounds.

member.name: M:Bob.Change.RotatingSetsToString(System.Int32[][])
member.summary: Converts a jagged array of rotating sets into a human readable string.
member.param: The jagged array of rotating sets.
member.returns: A human readable string representing the rotating sets.

member.name: M:Bob.Change.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether this change equals another object.
member.param: The other change.
member.returns: True if this change is equal to `obj`, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Bob.Change.GetHashCode
member.summary: Gets the integer hash code of the change (the compiler wanted me to do this).
member.returns: The hash code of this change.

member.name: M:Bob.Change.ToString
member.summary: Generates a human readable string representation of this change, as you would expect it to be written.
member.returns: A string representing the change.

member.name: T:Bob.Constants
member.summary: A static class to store the generic constants for BobC#

member.name: F:Bob.Constants.bell_names
member.summary: A string of all bell names (basically, rounds will always be a substring of this string).

member.name: F:Bob.Constants.tenor
member.summary: An integer to represent the heaviest bell (used when specifying which bell is conducting).

member.name: F:Bob.Constants.alpha
member.summary: A string of every lowercase character.

member.name: F:Bob.Constants.ALPHA
member.summary: A string of every uppercase character.

member.name: M:Bob.Constants.GetBellNameIndexingFromZero(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the bell name representing bell `n` where the treble is bell #0.
member.param: The requested bell's index.
member.returns: The character representing bell `n`.

member.name: M:Bob.Constants.GetBellNameIndexingFromOne(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the bell name representing bell `n` where the treble is bell #1.
member.param: The requested bell's index.
member.returns: The character representing bell `n`.

member.name: M:Bob.Constants.GetBellIndexFromZero(System.Char)
member.summary: Gets the index of a character representing a bell, where the treble will return 0.
member.param: The character representing a bell.
member.returns: The index (from 0) of the bell.

member.name: M:Bob.Constants.GetBellIndexFromOne(System.Char)
member.summary: Gets the index of a character representing a bell, where the treble will return 1.
member.param: The character representing a bell.
member.returns: The index (from 1) of the bell.

member.name: T:Bob.Parity
member.summary: An enum which represents parity (oddness/evenness) of changes.

member.name: T:Bob.Stage
member.summary: An enum to represent a stage. They also return the correct number when cast to an int.

member.name: T:Bob.Classification
member.summary: An enum to store classifications of methods.

member.name: T:Bob.ITransposition
member.summary: An interface for any transposable object, e.g. Change or PlaceNotation.

member.name: M:Bob.ITransposition.GetArray
member.summary: A function to get an integer array representing the transposition of this object.
member.returns: An integer array representing the transposition.

member.name: T:Bob.Method
member.summary: A class to represent a method.

member.name: T:Bob.Method.HuntBell
member.summary: A class which represents a hunt bell in a method. HuntBell objects can't be changed once created.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.HuntBell.bell_number
member.summary: The number of this bell (indexed from zero).

member.name: P:Bob.Method.HuntBell.path
member.summary: A list of places which form the path of this hunt.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.HuntBell.stage
member.summary: The stage of the method which owns this hunt bell.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.HuntBell.is_plain_hunting
member.summary: True if this hunt bell follows a plain hunting path (in any rotation).

member.name: P:Bob.Method.HuntBell.is_treble_dodging
member.summary: True if this hunt bell follows a treble bobbing path (in any rotation).

member.name: P:Bob.Method.HuntBell.is_symmetrical
member.summary: True if this hunt bell path is symmetrical.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.HuntBell.spends_same_number_of_blows_in_each_place
member.summary: True if this hunt bell spends an equal number of blows in every place it visits.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.HuntBell.is_little
member.summary: True if this hunt bell is little (doesn't cover every place).

member.name: P:Bob.Method.HuntBell.rotated_path
member.summary: The rotated path of this hunt bell, such that if the path is symmetrical, so will this path. Will be null if no symmetry.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.HuntBell.GenerateRotatedPath
member.summary: Generates the rotated path.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.HuntBell.IsPlainHunting
member.summary: Function to determine whether this hunt bell is plain hunting.
member.returns: True if the hunt bell is plain hunting.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.HuntBell.IsTrebleDodging
member.summary: Function to determine whether this hunt bell is treble dodging.
member.returns: True if the hunt bell is treble dodging.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.HuntBell.IsSymmetrical
member.summary: Function to determine whether this hunt bell path is symmetrical.
member.returns: True if the hunt bell path is symmetrical.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.HuntBell.SpendsSameNumberOfBlowsInEachPlace
member.summary: Function to determine whether this hunt bell spends the same number of blows in every place it visits.
member.returns: True if the number of blows in each place is equal.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.HuntBell.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32[],Bob.Stage)
member.summary: Creates a hunt bell object, and lets BobC# set all the boolean values.
member.param: The index (from 0) of the bell represented by this hunt bell.
The path of this hunt bell as a list of places (indexed from 0).
The stage of the method which this hunt bell is part of.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.HuntBell.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32[],Bob.Stage,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a hunt bell object, setting all the boolean values manually (not reccomended).
member.param: The index (from 0) of the bell represented by this hunt bell.
The path of this hunt bell as a list of places (indexed from 0).
The stage of the method which this hunt bell is part of.
Whether the hunt bell is plain hunting.
Whether the hunt bell is treble dodging.
Whether the hunt bell is little.

member.name: T:Bob.Method.MethodNotClassifiedException
member.summary: An exception to be thrown when a method can't be classified.

member.name: T:Bob.Method.SymmetryType
member.summary: An enum to store the symmetry type of a method (used, e.g. for generating calls).

member.name: F:Bob.Method.m_place_notation
member.summary: A private field for the string place notation.

member.name: F:Bob.Method.calls
member.summary: A customisable list of call objects, which define the calls in this method.

member.name: F:Bob.Method.name
member.summary: The name of the method (the first part of the title, e.g. "Cambridge").

member.name: F:Bob.Method.classification
member.summary: The classification of the method (e.g. "Surprise").

member.name: F:Bob.Method.stage
member.summary: The stage of this method.

member.name: F:Bob.Method.is_little
member.summary: True if the method should have the tag "Little" in its name.

member.name: F:Bob.Method.is_differential
member.summary: True if the method should have the tag "Differential" in its name.

member.name: F:Bob.Method.override_title
member.summary: Set this to override the auto-generated title. Defaults to null.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.place_notation
member.summary: The string form of this method's place notation. Setting this will update all the other fields.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.title
member.summary: The title of the method. If `override_title` is null, this will generate the title automagically.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.place_notations
member.summary: The decoded place notations for the method.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.plain_lead_changes
member.summary: A list of changes in the plain lead (starting from the change after rounds).

member.name: P:Bob.Method.lead_end
member.summary: The lead end change of the method.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.lead_end_notation
member.summary: The last place notation of the method (even if the treble is not a hunt bell).

member.name: P:Bob.Method.half_lead_notation
member.summary: The middle place notation of the method (and null if the lead length is odd).

member.name: P:Bob.Method.leads_in_plain_course
member.summary: The number of leads in the plain course of this method.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.lead_length
member.summary: The number of changes in one lead of this method.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.plain_course_length
member.summary: The total number of changes in a plain course of this method.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.rotating_sets
member.summary: Gets the rotating sets of the lead end of the method (see ).

member.name: P:Bob.Method.hunt_bells
member.summary: A list of object representing the hunt bells in this method.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.symmetry_type
member.summary: The symmetry type of the method.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.is_place_method
member.summary: True if all the working bells never dodge (or make points, snap leads, etc).

member.name: P:Bob.Method.plain_course
member.summary: Generates a object representing the plain course of this method.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.main_hunt_bell
member.summary: The lowest numbered hunt bell of this method. Will always be the Treble if the Treble is hunting.

member.name: P:Bob.Method.is_treble_hunting
member.summary: True if the Treble is plain hunting.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.Classify
member.summary: Automagically sets the variable.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.GetPathOfBell(System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds the path of any bell as a list of places (indexed from 0). This is not always the length of the plain course.
member.param: The index (from 0) of the bell.
member.returns: A list of places (index from 0) which represent the bell's path.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.GetCallByName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds a object by it's full name (see ).
member.param: The full name of the call (see ).
member.returns: The object with the given name, or null.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.GetCallByNotation(System.Char)
member.summary: Finds a object by it's notation (see ).
member.param: The notation of the call (see ).
member.returns: The object with the given notation, or null.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.TouchFromCallList(Bob.Call[])
member.summary: Generates a object from an array of calls in the order that they should be called.
member.param: An array of objects in the order that they're called.
member.returns: The requested object.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.TouchFromCallList(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a object from a string of call notations, in upper- or lower-case.
member.param: The string of call notations in the order that they'll be called.
member.returns: The requested object.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.TouchFromCallingPositions(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a object from a string representing the calling positions.
member.param: An array of objects in the order that they're called.
The bell index (from 0) from which the touch is called.
member.returns: The requested object.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.HasPlainBobLikeSymmetry
member.summary: Determines whether this method has Plain Bob-like symmetry.
member.returns: True if this method has Plain Bob-like symmetry.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.HasGrandsireLikeSymmetry
member.summary: Determines whether this method has Grandsire-like symmetry.
member.returns: True if this method has Grandsire-like symmetry.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.IsPlaceMethod
member.summary: Determines whether the working bells only make places.
member.returns: False if any working bell makes any dodges (or snaps, points, etc.).

member.name: M:Bob.Method.RefreshNotation
member.summary: Called whenever the method's is updated.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.GenerateStandardCalls(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates standard (Bob, Single and Plain) objects for this method.
member.param: Determines whether to overwrite the current call array.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.#ctor(System.String,System.String,Bob.Classification,Bob.Stage,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates a method and specifying all classifications.
member.param: The place notation of the method, e.g. "x3x4x25x36x4x5x6x7,2". Can have implicit places.
The name of the method, e.g. "Cambridge".
The classification of the method, e.g.
The stage of the method, e.g.
Set this to manually set the value, e.g. for Gransire.
True if the "Little" tag should appear in the method title.
True if the "Differential" tag should appear in the method title.
If, true BobC# will automagically set the standard Bob, Single and Plain calls.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.#ctor(System.String,System.String,Bob.Stage,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates a method without specifying any classifications, leaving BobC# to classify it for you.
member.param: The place notation of the method, e.g. "x3x4x25x36x4x5x6x7,2". Can have implicit places.
The name of the method, e.g. "Cambridge".
The stage of the method, e.g.
Set this to manually set the value, e.g. for Gransire.
If, true BobC# will automagically set the standard Bob, Single and Plain calls.

member.name: M:Bob.Method.GetMethod(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a method from the CCCBR method library (null if no method of that title exists).
member.param: The title of the method you want to find.
member.returns: The object with that title (or null).

member.summary: The stage of the method.

member.name: T:Bob.PlaceNotation
member.summary: A class to represent any single place notation. Once created, objects cannot be changed.

member.name: P:Bob.PlaceNotation.notation
member.summary: The string notation for this place notation.

member.name: P:Bob.PlaceNotation.array
member.summary: An array representing the transposition caused by this place notation.

member.name: P:Bob.PlaceNotation.places_made
member.summary: An array of places (indexed from 0) made in this place notation.

member.name: P:Bob.PlaceNotation.stage
member.summary: Gets the stage of this place notation.

member.name: P:Bob.PlaceNotation.is_12
member.summary: True if this place notation is a "12" or a "12n" place notation.

member.name: P:Bob.PlaceNotation.is_1n
member.summary: True if this place notation is "1n". For all odd-staged notations, this returns false.

member.name: P:Bob.PlaceNotation.has_internal_places
member.summary: True if this place notation contains internal places (places not at either end of the notation).

member.name: M:Bob.PlaceNotation.GetArray
member.summary: Gets the array representing the transposition of this place notation. Satisfies the interface.
member.returns: An array representing this transposition.

member.name: M:Bob.PlaceNotation.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks equality between this object and another object.
member.param: The other object.
member.returns: True if this is equal to `obj`.

member.name: M:Bob.PlaceNotation.GetHashCode
member.summary: Gets the hash code for this place notation.
member.returns: The hash code summing up this place notation.

member.name: M:Bob.PlaceNotation.ToString
member.summary: Gets the string representation of this object.
member.returns: A string representation of this object.

member.name: M:Bob.PlaceNotation.#ctor(System.String,Bob.Stage)
member.summary: Generates a single object from a string notation and a .
member.param: The string notation of this place notation.
The stage of this place notation.

member.summary: Converts a string of place notations (with lead end shortcuts, implicit places, etc.) to an array of place notations.

The of the place notations.
member.returns: An array of converted place notations

member.name: M:Bob.PlaceNotation.CombinePlaceNotations(Bob.PlaceNotation[])
member.summary: Generates the combined transposition caused by consecutively applying an array of place notations.
member.param: The list of place notations, in the order of transposition.
member.returns: The change representing the combined transposition.

member.name: M:Bob.PlaceNotation.GenerateChangeArray(Bob.PlaceNotation[],Bob.Change)
member.summary: Generates a list of every change caused by applying each of `notations`.

Set the start change to something other than rounds.

member.name: F:Bob.PlaceNotation.x_notations
member.summary: A customisable array of possible notations for a 'cross' place notations.

member.summary: A customisable array of generic delimiters for between changes.

member.name: F:Bob.PlaceNotation.leadend_delimiters
member.summary: A customisable array of delimiters to represent lead end symmetry.

member.summary: Operator which returns true if two objects are not equal.
